dalserver
Class ScsMessier

java.lang.Object
  dalserver.ScsMessier

public class ScsMessier
extends java.lang.Object

ScsMessier implements the essential functionality needed to do a simple cone search (SCS) query on the Messier catalog, which is built directly into the DALServer SCS implementation in order to provide a simple demonstration SCS service.

Nested Class Summary
static class ScsMessier.MessierObj
          A single object within the Messier catalog.

Method Detail

query

public void query(ScsParamSet params,
                  RequestResponse response)
           throws DalServerException
Query the Messier catalog, writing results to the output request response object. The response object can later be serialized and returned in various output formats.

Parameters:
params - The SCS service input parameters.
response - The request response object.
Throws:
DalServerException

parseHMS

public double parseHMS(java.lang.String hms)
Convert a coordinate value in various formats into a floating point value. Both sexagesimal and decimal formats are permitted.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Messier catalog utilities. 
   ingest [csv-file]    Turn a CSV version of the SCS data model
                                into a ScsData class which contains raw data
                                defining the data model.

   doc [type]           Generate an HTML version of the SCS keyword
                                dictionary.

   table [type]         Generate Java code to create the indicated
                                keywords in a RequestResponse object.
